sentences.sContent: The theory which is once again put forth, that the Germans as such are inherently vicious, is hardly tenable and not very creditable to those who hold it.
sentences.sContent_eng: The theory which is once again put forth, that the Germans as such are inherently vicious, is hardly tenable and not very creditable to those who hold it.
sentences.sCn: 那个再一次被提出的理论，即德国人天生就那样邪恶，是很难站得住脚的，并且对持有这一理论的那些人是非常不值得称道的。

synos.tran: （主张等）站得住脚的；可维持的

remMethod.val: ten(拿住) + able(能…的) → 能够拿住的 → 站得住脚的
